frontDocsItems.title: XN Wiki
frontDocsItems.description: Unofficial documentation of the XN framework. Feel free to add/edit the wiki.

frontDocsItems.title: Blueprints
frontDocsItems.description: Blueprints library (forked from Tinkerpop) - A set of unified interfaces for graph operations, implementation of adapters for a few graph DB"s (e.g. Neo4j) as well as an in-memory graph called TinkerGraph.

frontDocsItems.title: Pacer
frontDocsItems.description: Library for efficient traversal and extensible data modeling on Graph database. Open-source, written in JRuby, supports any Blueprints-enabled graph.

frontDocsItems.title: Pacer Training part 1
frontDocsItems.description: The first section of a full-day workshop - Introducing graphs, the database ecosystem and the Pacer library.

frontDocsItems.title: Pacer Training, part 2
frontDocsItems.description: The second section of a full-day workshop - Basic graph processing and traversal, using Pacer.

frontDocsItems.title: Pacer Training part 3
frontDocsItems.description: The third section of a full-day workshop - Advanced graph processing and traversal, using Pacer.

frontDocsItems.title: Pacer Training, part 4
frontDocsItems.description: The fourth section of a full-day workshop - Modeling your data as a graph, and defining the model using Pacer.

frontDocsItems.title: Pacer Training, part 5
frontDocsItems.description: The fifth section of a full-day workshop - Advanced techniques and common patterns in graph data modeling.

frontDocsItems.title: Pacer Training, part 6
frontDocsItems.description: A demo of a graph-based web application using Sinatra, Pacer and Neo4j.
